channel.title: Jarring the client
channel.description:
Hey,
For some reason when i try to JAR my client it doesn't work. When i double click on it it just doesn't do anything. I tried both client and loader as manifest, this is the error for loader: [code] THIS BATCH IS FOR DEBUGGING THE EXECUTABLE JAR ONLY DOUBLE-CLICK THE "Artim317.jar" TO RUN IT - Generated by: JAR Maker (http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/)
C:\Users\Ruben\Desktop>java -jar Artim317.jar Error: Could not find or load main class loader Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Same thing for client, but instead it says Error: Could not find or load main class client.
These are my settings: http://puu.sh/lmldm/02d1da316d.png
And for the signing: http://puu.sh/lmled/45ca82214b.png
Note that i also tried to jar it with locating the entire client folder and not only the bin folder. That didn't work either.
Anyone knows whats wrong? Using the Ruse client.

item.title: Jarring the client
item.dc:creator: @Soulxs Soulxs
item.description:
@Soulxs wrote:

Ooh it’s case sensitive. Thanks.
(For those wondering, change it to “Client”.

Read full topic

item.title: Jarring the client
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Does the class “loader” exist? Specifically with a lower case l.
If no, then that’s your problem. You have to define the main class exactly as it’s seen, case sensitive as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Jarring the client
item.dc:creator: @Soulxs Soulxs
item.description:
@Soulxs wrote:

Hey,

For some reason when i try to JAR my client it doesn’t work. When i double click on it it just doesn’t do anything.
I tried both client and loader as manifest, this is the error for loader:

THIS BATCH IS FOR DEBUGGING THE EXECUTABLE JAR ONLY
DOUBLE-CLICK THE "Artim317.jar" TO RUN IT
-
Generated by: JAR Maker (http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/)

C:\Users\Ruben\Desktop>java -jar Artim317.jar
Error: Could not find or load main class loader
Press any key to continue . . .

Same thing for client, but instead it says Error: Could not find or load main class client.

These are my settings:
http://puu.sh/lmldm/02d1da316d.png

And for the signing:
http://puu.sh/lmled/45ca82214b.png

Note that i also tried to jar it with locating the entire client folder and not only the bin folder. That didn’t work either.

Anyone knows whats wrong? Using the Ruse client.
